repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:argon
MAINTAINER Juha Lindstedt <juha@pakastin.fi>

ENV NODE_ENV=production

RUN mkdir -p /app

COPY ./src /app/src
COPY ./package.json /app/package.json
COPY ./server.js /app/server.js

WORKDIR /app

RUN npm install && npm cache clean --force;

ENTRYPOINT ["npm", "start"]
EXPOSE 80
